hearing_title: B20-0500, the Hearing Notice Test Act of 2014
hearing_notice_body: to take testimony on whether this is even a good idea or not. Maybe on a couple of bills? Perhaps B20-0131 or PR12-0140. Or B20-0132, B20-0135, and B20-1150. Now let's try an internal link
